title: The Leaked Salary Spreadsheet
setting: Vanguard Consulting, open-plan office, Tuesday 11 AM
premise: A confidential spreadsheet showing every employee's salary was emailed anonymously to the entire company at 3:17 AM from a spoofed internal address. IT traced the send to an office workstation.

suspects.name: Martin Cole
suspects.motive: Discovered he earns less than a newer hire doing the same job
suspects.alibi: I was at home sleeping. My smart doorbell camera shows I arrived home at 6:30 PM Monday and didn't leave until 7:15 AM Tuesday. The footage is timestamped.

suspects.name: Renee Adler
suspects.motive: In a dispute with management over pay equity and wanted to force transparency
suspects.alibi: I worked late until 10 PM finishing reviews. Then I drove to my sister's house in Millbrook and stayed overnight. I came to work from there Tuesday morning.

suspects.name: Hector Fuentes
suspects.motive: His team's wages were frozen while executives got bonuses
suspects.alibi: I was on the overnight shift doing floor waxing from 11 PM to 5 AM. I was in the east wing all night with my floor buffer running constantly.

suspects.name: Tara Singh
suspects.motive: Recently denied a raise after leading a critical project launch
suspects.alibi: I left the office at 7 PM and went to a coding meetup at Brewer's Pub downtown. It ran until midnight, then I took a rideshare home and went to bed.

clues.title: Workstation Location
clues.content: IT confirmed the email was sent from a workstation in the west wing, third floor. Badge records show Hector's card accessed the west wing at 2:50 AM.

clues.title: Night Custodian Report
clues.content: The night custodian says she passed through the east wing at 3 AM and did not hear any floor buffer running. She found it odd because Hector was scheduled to be there.

clues.title: Floor Waxing Schedule
clues.content: The facilities work order shows the east wing was already waxed last Thursday. Hector's overnight assignment was actually for the south wing stairwells, not the east wing.
